caption: Public Key Certificate
name: public_key_certificate
description: The Public Key Certificate, or a digital certificate, is used to prove the ownership of a public key. The certificate includes information about its lifetime, about the identity of its owner (called the subject) and the digital signature of an entity that has verified the certificate's contents (called the issuer).

expiration_time.description: The expiration time of the certificate.

created_time.description: The time when the certificate was created.
